description.summary: Gained hands-on experience with supervised learning, model evaluation, feature engineering, and scikit-learn tools to build and improve predictive models.

Gained hands-on experience visualizing data with Seaborn, including bar plots, histograms, box plots, heatmaps, and scatter plots; applied best practices for exploring distributions, relationships, and categorical data in Python.
Demonstrated proficiency in data analysis using the pandas library in Python, including DataFrame manipulation, data cleaning, aggregation, merging, and time series analysis.
